title:
Condensed Encodings of Projective Clifford Operations in Arbitrary
  Dimension
abstract:
We provide a careful analysis of the structure theorem for the $n$-qudit
projective Clifford group and various encoding schemes for its elements. In
particular, we derive formulas for evaluation, composition, and inversion. Our
results apply to all integers $d\geq2$, most notably the even case.
